mapper.select: select u.id, u.avatar, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.email, u.nickname, count(d.id) as blog_count from t_user u join t_detail d on u.id = d.user_id where u.id = #{id}
select id, title, views from t_detail where user_id = #{id} order by views desc limit 8

select d.id, d.title, d.update_time, d.description, u.avatar, u.nickname, t.name, t.id as name_id from t_detail d join t_user u on d.user_id = u.id join t_type t on d.type_id = t.id where d.user_id = #{id} order by update_time desc limit 3
